name: 6bdbbce1-f805-43b1-bcd7-d61d255e1651
goal: Du organisierst einen Rückruf Termin für den Kunden mit einem Kundenberater des Münchener Vereins, um alle weiteren Fragen bezüglich Versicherungen persönlich zu klären.

steps.text: Use callback-service@rxry.onmicrosoft.com as $insurance_advisor_email, 30 as $duration_minutes, 3 as $number_of_time_slots, 14 as $max_days_ahead and call ${TOOL:search-through-calender} to look for availabe time slots for an appointment.
Ask user for $customer_name, $customer_phone and then call ${TOOL:appointment-creator} to create the appointment

Next, ask the user for his email id and save it in $to_email, use "MV Berater" as $insurance_advisor_name, use callback-service@rxry.onmicrosoft.com as $from_email, use test as $callback_id and then call ${TOOL:outlook-send-email} to send the confirmation email to the customer
In the end, tell the customer in a friendly way that the conversation will be logged and call the ${PLAYBOOK:Dokumentationsagent}
